name: PokeXplore Guide
landing_text: Welcome to PokeXplore!$(br2)For the best experience:$(li)$(l:allocate_ram)Allocate more RAM$(li)$(l:enable_resource_packs)Allow server resource packs$(). If there are more than two categories on the next page, you already have the server pack installed.$(li)$(l:client_mods)Install optional client-side mods
